item.title: Social Enterprise
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MiEdsK2zv8U Harvard Innovation Labs Published on Nov 5, 2013 SUBSCRIBED 61K SUBSCRIBE SUBSCRIBED UNSUBSCRIBE How can you make sure that when you DO build it, they WILL come? The truth is, you can’t - but there’s a lot you can do to greatly improve your odds. In this workshop, Abby Fichtner, the i-lab’s Hacker in Residence, walks you through a framework for identifying the right product to build for the right market.
